projects.title: healthcompanion
projects.description: Trimester Project based off Ruby on Rails showcasing the usage of Relational and Non-Relational DBMS.

information: A short introduction of myself. I am currently undertaking a degree in Computing Science. I am passionate about discovering new technologies and getting my hands dirty on it. I have interest towards web development and data analytics.

My journey started when I first enrolled into Game Development, subsequently switching courses to Financial Informatics where I am exposed to various programming languages and technologies. I had the opportunity to dive into bits of data analytics as well, learning the basis of data cleaning and visualization.

I am a team player, enjoy working with people. Not a leader myself but a follower instead. In web development, I am more inclined towards front-end development but ultimately, I am open to learning new things and exploring new technologies.
